name: Creamy Chowder
preparation: In a bowl, whisk seasoning with milk; set aside.
In Multipurpose Steamer, combine potatoes, celery, and carrots with water. Cover and microwave until tender, 10–12 min.
Stir in reserved seasoning mixture. Microwave, uncovered, for 15 min, stirring every 5 min until thickened.
Stir in clams, including broth. Spoon into bowls.
In a bowl, whisk seasoning with milk; set aside.
In Multipurpose Pot, combine potatoes, celery, and carrots with water. Cover and cook until tender, 10–12 min.
Stir in reserved seasoning mixture. Bring to a boil; remove from heat.
Stir in clams, including broth. Spoon into bowls.
tips: Swap clams for 2 cups cooked shrimp, salmon, lobster, or crab and 1⁄2 cup water.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with a side salad and your favorite Epicure salad dressing.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
